lifecycle: list of the operations allowed in this state. This list is advisory only and the server state may have changed by the time this field is read by a client.

ty.provision: Indicates this host is able to provision another VM
ty.shutdown: Indicates this host is in the process of shutting itself down
ty.reboot: Indicates this host is in the process of rebooting
ty.power_on: Indicates this host is in the process of being powered on
ty.vm_start: This host is starting a VM
ty.vm_resume: This host is resuming a VM
ty.vm_migrate: This host is the migration target of a VM

msg_errors.err_doc: The host toolstack is still initialising. Please wait.
The host failed to acquire an IP address on its management interface and therefore cannot contact the master.
The master reports that it cannot talk back to the slave on the supplied management IP address.
The master says the host is not known to it. Perhaps the Host was deleted from the master's database? Perhaps the slave is pointing to the wrong master?
This host failed in the middle of an automatic failover operation and needs to retry the failover action
This operation is not allowed under your license.  Please contact your support representative.
This host cannot join a pool because its license does not support pooling.
Host cannot rejoin pool because it should have fenced (it is not in the master's partition)
